name: AnyList
0:
”Alexa, ask AnyList to add apples to my grocery list.”
”Alexa, ask AnyList to add toothbrush to my packing list.”
”Alexa, ask AnyList to show my salmon recipe.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: any list
Developer Terms of Use
des:
AnyList makes it simple to create and share shopping lists, collect and organize your recipes, and schedule and prepare meals so you can spend less time planning life and more time enjoying it.

This skill allows you to add items to AnyList with Alexa and view your AnyList recipes on Alexa devices with a screen.

To get started, download AnyList from the iOS App Store or the Google Play Store and create an AnyList account. Then enable this skill and link your AnyList account to Alexa.

After linking your AnyList account, open AnyList to choose the lists you want to make accessible on your Alexa devices. Then you can use Alexa to quickly add items to those lists. For example: "Alexa, ask AnyList to add apples to my grocery list".

To view a recipe on an Alexa device with a screen, such as an Echo Show, just say "Alexa, ask AnyList to show my salmon recipe".
